title: defeat/victroy ending so loud now!!!
body: I get the sound stuff is being updated, but WOW! Ending of a match is so loud now, as someone who plays with earphones on, actually hurting my ear drums, compared to the other in game sounds, please fix!

replies.body: Very sorry about this - we're aware and this will be fixed for sure!

While you're fixing that, would you mind fixing the Champion Select Volume? It's automatically super loud so I had to turn it down myself, and every few patches it seems to force itself back to full volume after I've forgotten how I turned it down the last time.
It's a lot more than one audio bug, please fix every bit of it.

That is not specific nor helpful to them. If you want things fixed, try providing useful feedback.

And if you just want to insult them then get out, we don't need that crap here.
spells, recalls, and ending screen are all so very loud please fix
Also I am not sure about on live but on the PBE the sfx for recall get gradually louder and LOUDER and sfx for summoner spells are very very loud as well.
INGAME - vistory/defeat sound - leveling up - showing mastery is super loud now. its killing my eardrums - will league of legends pay for my doctor visit?
Well its not only the ending. for me the {{summoner:4}}  and backport sound are very loud too {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

MY EARS FKING HURT. ARE you going to pay for my doctors copay visit bill and just to get my hearing checked? I played this match two people leveled and 1 recall i swear my ears were numb for next hour. This is a serious safety and health hazard.  Fix fast please. This not something you just sit on when it comes to health and safety there is no fucking excuse that this should take more than a day. Especially when people are wearing headphones imagine someone ear drums getting damaged cause of this.
